Title: Creates the "I love NY outdoors" program; appropriation
Summary: Creates the "I love NY outdoors" program; such program shall require the commissioner of economic development to develop a marketing strategy that would promote New York as a premiere destination for hunting and fishing; appropriates $2,500,000 therefor.
LawCode: Add Art 9-B ยง216, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to creating the "I love NY outdoors" program; and making an appropriation therefor
